$$._: The latest developments in Artificial Intelligence (AI) are the focal point in increasing the performance of other technologies and the evolution of Industry 4.0. Considering the benefits of AI in today’s world, businesses must move towards using Integrated AI tools and services. This paper introduces a business model based on AI-as-a-Service (AIaaS), which provides an integrated bundle of AI products and services. The strategic approach, roadmap, and heuristic pricing model provided in this paper can be considered as a benchmark for AIaaS companies.
We propose a novel business model based on artificial Intelligence-as-a-service.
We introduce a strategic approach and systematic roadmap for artificial intelligence-as-a-service implementation.
We develop a business plan using integrated machine vision, natural language processing, and data-driven systems.
We provide a case study to show how the proposed business plan is implemented in real world.
We present a comprehensive commercialization process for our Artificial Intelligence-as-a-Service business plan.
